sentences.cn: “ 梅森, " 那声音说, " 梅森小姐. ”

sentences.en: He carved marble faster than any mason.
sentences.cn: 他雕刻大理石的速度比任何石匠都快.

sentences.en: He's a way - up Mason, and that goes a long way.
sentences.cn: 他在共济会里地位很高, 这一点起了很大的作用.

sentences.en: Here Jephson thought of Mason - let him counteract that if he can.
sentences.cn: 杰甫逊这么说的时候,心里想到的是梅森,看他能不能反驳.

sentences.en: Indiana had a history of bigotry unequaled north of the Mason - Dixon line.
sentences.cn: 印地安纳州的种族偏见的历史在 梅森——迪克森 线以北是无出其右的.

sentences.en: Mason looks at the black men, then at his assistants.
sentences.cn: 梅森看了看这几个黑人, 又向他的助手们看了一眼.

sentences.en: Mason took the rebuke lightly and turned again to Clyde.
sentences.cn: 梅森对这指责满不在乎,就又朝克莱德这边回过头来.

sentences.en: Mason was fairly beside himself with rage.
sentences.cn: 梅森火冒三丈,简直控制不住了.

sentences.en: Mason was outclassed by Lennox Lewis in his tragic last fight at Wembley.
sentences.cn: 梅森在他悲剧性的最后一场拳击比赛中于文布利惨败给了伦诺克斯·刘易斯。

sentences.en: Mason was seated on the broken front steps.
sentences.cn: 梅森正在前面破败的石级上坐着.

sentences.en: Mason was terribly crushed. The most cursory examination revealed it.
sentences.cn: 麦森给压得很惨.即使马马虎虎地瞧一眼也看得出.

sentences.en: Mason was uninhibited in his questions about Foster's family.
sentences.cn: 梅森就福斯特的家庭毫无顾忌地发问。

sentences.en: Mason went home for a couple of hours' kip.
sentences.cn: 梅森回家睡了几个小时。

sentences.en: Mr. Mason walked out during the performance.
sentences.cn: 梅森先生在演出时退场。

sentences.en: So keep a stiff upper lip before Mason and everybody.
sentences.cn: 在梅森面前,在所有的人面前,都要沉着冷静.

words.tran_cn: 泥瓦匠；共济会会员（等于freemason）

trans.tran_cn: 石匠，泥瓦匠，共济会会员，梅森（人名）
trans.tran_en: A mason is a person who is skilled at making things or building things with stone or bricks
